jcr:content.jcr:title: List of deaths by motorcycle accidents

contentheadline.headline: List of deaths by motorcycle accidents

contentrichtext.text: {{About|Motorcycling fatalities on public roads.|fatalities in motorcycle racing see|Deaths in motorcycle racing}} {{TOC right}} This is a list of people with Wikipedia articles who died in a motorcycle accident on public roads. ==Road accident== The following people died in [[Traffic collision|road accidents]] on motorcycles: <!-- arranged chronologically --> *[[T. E. Lawrence]] known as [[Lawrence of Arabia]], 18 May 1935, soldier, writer. *[[Bluey Wilkinson]], 27 July 1940, speedway rider *[[Ahmed Hassanein]], 19 February 1946, Egyptian courtier and explorer *[[Richard Farina]], 30 April 1966, singer, musician. *[[Duane Allman]], 29 October 1971, musician. *[[Berry Oakley]], 11 November 1972, musician *[[Don Rich]], 17 July 1974, musician (Buck Owens and the Buckaroos) *[[Bob Gassoff]], 27 May 1977, ice hockey player *[[Reg Armstrong]], 1926 - 1979 Irish motorcycle racer *[[Stanley de Silva]], 12 April 1980, Sri Lankan cricketer *[[John Gardner (novelist)|John Gardner]], 14 September 1982, novelist *[[Gary Gabelich]] 26 January 1984, American former land speed record holder *[[Coluche]], aka Michel Colucci, 19 June 1986, French comedian *[[Barry Mannakee]], 14 May 1987, [[Royal Protection Squad]] bodyguard and alleged lover of [[Diana, Princess of Wales]] *[[Pete Conrad]], 8 July 1999, astronaut, third person to [[List_of_Apollo_astronauts#Apollo_astronauts_who_walked_on_the_Moon|walk on the Moon]]. *[[Niccolò Galli (footballer born 1983)|Niccolò Galli]], 10 February 2001, Italian footballer *[[Andy Kirby]], 18 July 2002, NASCAR Busch Series Driver *[[Bahattin Sofuoğlu]], 25 October 2002, Turkish motorcycle racer *[[Simon Milward]], 4 March 2005, Global Humanitarian Motorcyclist *Norberto Napolitano "[[Pappo]]", 24 February 2005, Argentinian Rock Musician *[[Sajjadul Hasan]], 16 March 2007, Bangladeshi cricketer. *[[Manjural Islam Rana]], 16 March 2007, Bangladeshi cricketer. *[[Diego Corrales]], 7 May 2007, professional boxer *[[Lenar Gilmullin]], 22 June 2007, Russian footballer *[[Norifumi Abe]], 7 October 2007, Japanese professional motorcycle racer *[[Luc Bourdon]], 29 May 2008, [[NHL]] Defensive prospect, 1st round pick of the [[Vancouver Canucks]] *[[Andrea Pininfarina]], 7 August 2008, Engineer and manager, CEO of [[Pininfarina]] *[[Atsushi Kuroi]], 1 February 2010, Japanese drifting driver<ref>http://speedhunters.com/archive/2010/02/02/news-gt-gt-rip-atsushi- kuroi.aspx</ref> * [[Mitch Lucker]] October 31 2012 former frontman of the band [[Suicide Silence]] ==Stunt accident== *[[Larry Desmedt|"Indian Larry" Desmedt]], 55, 30 August 2004, motorcycle builder and stuntman *[[Jeremy Lusk]], 24, 10 February 2009, American [[freestyle motocross]] rider, competing in X Knights competition in [[San Jose, Costa Rica|San Jose]], [[Costa Rica]] *Jim McNeil, 32, 7 November 2011, American [[freestyle motocross]] rider, practice for an exhibition prior to the [[AAA Texas 500]] at [[Texas Motor Speedway]]<ref>{{cite news | url=http://espn.go.com/dallas/story/_/id/7199717/fmx-rider-jim-mcneil-dies-exhibition-practice | work = ESPN | title = FMX rider Jim McNeil dies | date=2011-11-07 | accessdate=2011-11-18}}</ref> ==Testing accident== *1896 [[Sylvester H. Roper]] [[Cambridge, Massachusetts]]. Crash preceded by or followed by heart failure. *2007 [[Noriyasu Numata]] (JPN) Okayama International Circuit ==See also== * [[Motorcycle safety]] *[[List of motorcycle deaths in U.S. by year]] *[[List of Billown Course fatal accidents]] *[[List of Daytona International Speedway fatalities]] *[[:Category:Lists of motorsport fatalities]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Lists of people by cause of death|Motorcycling]] [[Category:Motorcycle racers| Deaths]] [[Category:Motorcycle sport lists|Deaths]] [[Category:Lists of transport accidents and incidents|Motorcycling]]
